content: Need to include on the Agenda, who to replace John Moerhke as the FMG rep for II (and any others he is a liason for)
I though John was continuing but on his own, has that changed?
he's not here, so I think the intent was temporary
I am still an HL7 member, and am still thus co-chair in Security WG and member of FMG. I am simply not at the WGM...other FMG members have missed WGM, so I didn't see this as a problem.

Yes, I didn't notice your question Brian. John hasn't resigned and still holds his role. And the joint sessions at the WGM are normally managed by FHIR-I co-chairs rather than FMG reps, so I don't think we need to worry for Montreal.
Sorry, it seems I have completely mis-understood the situation. My apologies.
